entries.description: CodeWhisperer: Fix test file supplemental context not working as expected on OS not using '/' as file path separator
CodeWhisperer sometimes fails on big files
CodeWhisperer: fix java test file name MyClassTests.java (plural) will not be captured if file is not living in a test folder
SAM: create, run and debug Python 3.11 Lambdas #3753
SAM run/debug detects and displays SAM CLI errors, so you spend less time inspecting the Output

SAM template detection now skips directories specified in [user settings](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/getstarted/settings) `files.exclude`, `search.exclude`, or `files.watcherExclude`. This improves performance on big workspaces and avoids the "Scanning CloudFormation templates..." message. [#3510](https://github.com/aws/aws-toolkit-vscode/issues/3510)
Toolkit no longer explicitly checks if Docker is running, instead it lets SAM CLI decide that #3588
